projects.name: Amazon Digital Music Recommender System
projects.alt: Machine learning model visualization showing recommendation system architecture
projects.description: Built a comprehensive recommender system for Amazon Digital Music reviews using multiple machine learning approaches. Conducted extensive EDA on review data and implemented collaborative filtering, logistic regression, SVM, and deep learning models with PyTorch using TF-IDF for text feature extraction.
projects.keywords: Machine Learning, PyTorch, Recommender Systems, NLP, TF-IDF

projects.name: Mini RISC-V Operating System
projects.alt: RISC-V processor architecture diagram showing system components
projects.description: Implemented a complete operating system from scratch in C based on QEMU simulator. Features include context switching with trapping, priority process scheduling, virtual memory management with three-level page tables, dynamic memory allocation, user-state program loading and execution, and thread forking.
projects.keywords: Operating Systems, C, Assembly, QEMU, Virtual Memory

projects.name: TCP Connection Protocol Implementation
projects.alt: Network protocol diagram showing TCP connection flow
projects.description: Built a working TCP Connection Protocol with Sender and Receiver components in C++, achieving transmission speeds of 190 Mbit/s. Implemented message transmission mechanisms with functions for message waiting between network interfaces and routes.
projects.keywords: Networking, C++, TCP Protocol, High Performance

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.alt: Database schema diagram showing library management system structure
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive library management system with both frontend and backend components using Python, PyQt5, and MySQL. Implemented layered architecture and modularization concepts with complete CRUD operations.

projects.name: MySQL Honeypot Security System
projects.alt: Network security diagram showing honeypot architecture
projects.description: Created and deployed a honeypot on MySQL server to detect, prevent, and defend against network threats by luring, monitoring, and analyzing attacker activities. Collected and analyzed data about different types of security attacks to simulate and optimize network security strategies.
projects.keywords: Security, MySQL, Network Security, Threat Detection
